quote: I started out too strong. That's why I have to hold back now. But even when I do, I can still win with one punch!
I don't do it for the money. I do it for the fun of it. You know, the thrill of the hunt!
Being a hero doesn't mean you're invincible. It just means that you're brave enough to stand up and do what's needed.
The true power of us human beings is that we can change ourselves on our own.
If you're always worried about crushing the ants beneath you... you won't be able to walk.
I'll keep advancing with my head down!
Monsters are the result of our sins. If we hadn't sinned, they wouldn't exist.
I don't want to be a hero anymore.
